definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Kant and Rawls think Patrick has a point.
sentences.chinese: 康德和罗尔斯认为帕特里克有一个观点。

sentences.english: There was talk of Patrick going to Arsenal over the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季有传言说帕特里克会去阿森纳。

sentences.english: Then Patrik Berger got sick and I was in midfield.
sentences.chinese: 然后帕特里克博格生病了，我就出现在了中场。

sentences.english: ForPatrick, having been in the Army, that was their mission.
sentences.chinese: 对帕特里克这些当过兵的人来说，那曾是他们的目标。

sentences.english: On the following day, Partrick went to the house again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，帕特里克再次来到首相的住处。

sentences.english: And it's true, sometimes he did feel like a ding-a-ling.
sentences.chinese: 他说得对，有时候帕特里克觉得自己真像个傻瓜。

sentences.english: On the following day, Crawley went to the house again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，帕特里克再次来到前首相的住处。

sentences.english: "Father, do you think Patrick should be eliminated?" Estelle asked.
sentences.chinese: “父亲，你也认为帕特里克应该铲除？”埃斯特尔问。

sentences.english: Fine day for a shoot, " Patrick said."
sentences.chinese: “真是射猎的好天气，”帕特里克说道。
先生，帕特里克已露相了。

sentences.english: Swayze was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in January 2008.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里克于2008年1月被确诊患有胰脏癌。

sentences.english: Patrick needs to use specially adapted computer equipment.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里克需要使用专门改装过的电脑设备。

sentences.english: Fitzpatrick said all depends on Russia.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨帕特里克表示，一切都取决于俄罗斯。

sentences.english: Patrick Likes to act in the school paly.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里克喜欢在学校戏剧团里演戏。

sentences.english: Pete Wentz, Andy Hurley, Patrick Stump and Joe Trohman of Fall Out Boy pose for a red-carpet photo.
sentences.chinese: 皮特温兹，安迪赫尔利，帕特里克树桩和乔走红毯。

sentences.english: Someone like Sir Patrick Stewart, say, or Benedict Cumberbatch?
sentences.chinese: 像帕特里克先生说，斯图尔特，或者本尼迪克？

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
